Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.pagemodel

Class ContentItem

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.pagemodel.ContentItem
public class ContentItem extends Object
Represents a content item (document) in PageModel API responses. Provides type-safe access to document fields and conversion to custom POJOs.

  • Method Details

    • as

      public <T> T as(Class<T> type)
      Converts the document data to a custom POJO type. Uses Jackson's convertValue for type-safe mapping.
      Type Parameters:
      T - target type
      Parameters:
      type - target class
      Returns:
      converted object, or null if data is null

    • getDataField

      public <T> T getDataField(String key)
      Gets a field value from the data map.
      Type Parameters:
      T - expected type
      Parameters:
      key - field name
      Returns:
      field value cast to type T, or null if not present

    • getNestedField

      public <T> T getNestedField(String path)
      Gets a nested field value using dot notation. Example: getNestedField("author.name")
      Type Parameters:
      T - expected type
      Parameters:
      path - dot-separated path (e.g., "author.name")
      Returns:
      field value cast to type T, or null if path not found
